Reviews.Title: “Fab hotel”
Reviews.Author: siriolhogg
Reviews.Content: stayed lots hotels spain italy sweden germany france hotel stayed 5 days business double king size bed facing delightful park considering easter hotel kids didnt hear sound quiet bed clean comfortable roomy bath bath spotless tv bbc news cnn breakfast excellent cooked breakfast fruit cereal fantastic assortment fresh bread quality jam honey meat cake etc etc park road lovely cafe superior snacks coffee etc friday road st lovely market bus 200 goes outside hotel centre berlin staff fuss english staying gain retaurant serves food michelin star filling

Reviews.Title: “clean hotel, but noisy”
Reviews.Author: kaask0p
Reviews.Content: hotel location outside main city centre bus 200 takes city 10 mins location actually fine clean tv difficult remote heavy german language channels bbc cnn hotel noisy literally hear below door top building door deadend street starts window airco meant woke bang truck offloading building material hotel time stay central probably pay little

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, but location could be better”
Reviews.Author: Danois
Reviews.Content: hotel located opposite park views parkthe hotel decorated pseudo empire style isnt taste decor bit building contemporary baths spacious clean breakfeast buffet ive hotel germany front desk staff tried helpful english able answer basic hotel front desk questions

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel”
Reviews.Author: IrelandDuchess
Reviews.Content: returned spending 3 days berlin husband stayed residenz hotel trip location perfect 200 bus stops outside door bus bring berlin city centre alexanderplatz staff welcoming helpful breakfast sundays breakfast served noon quality variety presentation fantastic loved hotel berlin laid city terrific definatly return doubt return

Reviews.Title: “Nice place, shame about the bed”
Reviews.Author: europair
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel welcoming efficient reception staff communal beautifully maintained unfortunately sleeping accommodation airy super bathroom furnishings apart bed bed uncomfortable fitted sheet mended day mended tear ripped disbelief left bed sheet delay weren’t happy entire stay bed properly – duvets merely top crumbled sheet photo vacuumed stay crumbs night snacks visible carpet stayed days sign bathroom hang towels happy reuse drop dirty ones floor twice dirty ones simply picked radiator positive note hotel location twenty minute walk alexanderplatz public transport links nearby visit park opposite charming water features woodland walks private parking available 15€ day hotel – plush smart efficient downstairs below average bedrooms overall stay hotel ambience downstairs friendly staff lovely breakfasts outweighed disappointment cleaning maintenance

Reviews.Title: “Thank you. it was a pleasure”
Reviews.Author: RikyCoh
Reviews.Content: loved stay 5 days clean hotel helpfull nice staff locating beautiful park appropriate individuals families children romantic charming neighborhood nice cafes bus 200 takes town

HotelInfo.Name: Victor's Residenz Hotel Berlin
HotelInfo.Address: Am Friedrichshain 16-18, 10407 Berlin, Germany
